Why is my windows wobbly?: you have compiz turned on and the wobbly windows plugin enabled
after using it, i feel like the windows not moving is unnatural :P
if you install compizconfig-settins-manager you can customize which plugins are off and on
I think i did something that turned it on. Something in appearance maybe
Yeah i turned on effects in ... you got it
wobbly windows and desktop cube are the most commonly requested settings, so those are the defaults when you turn on effects
use ccsm to turn off wobbly windows and keep cube or whatever you want
add/remove, synaptic, or sudo apt-get install compizconfig-settings-manager
